metadata.query_subject: My loan was not processed but I should get back the fee that I paid.So please refund my fee.
metadata.query_body: My loan was not processed but I should get back the fee that I paid.So please refund my fee.

fields.subject: Hello, I have paid 199 amount to get a loan,I didn't get a loan from you, so please give a refund amount of 200 immediately.
fields.email_body: Please give a refund of 199 that I paid to you.
fields.imrejected:
Dear [Customer Name],

Thank you for reaching out to us.

We understand your request for a refund of the Rs. 199 registration fee. Please allow us to clarify that this fee is charged to cover the costs involved in processing your loan application, including credit evaluation, verification, and system checks carried out by our lending partners.

As mentioned in our Terms of Service, this registration fee is non-refundable, regardless of whether the loan is approved or rejected. This is because the fee is used to carry out the necessary verification and assessment each time an application is submitted.

We appreciate your understanding in this matter. You are always welcome to apply again, and we encourage you to ensure your credit and financial details are accurate to improve your chances of approval.

Please let us know if you have any further questions.

Best regards,
Team Instamoney
